name: An Unfortunate Encounter
description:
Play as Wilhelm as he explores a haunted mansion, attempting to escape as he learns about its true history.  A small horror game I made using Smile Game Builder to test around with the software. Completable in 10-30 minutes depending on how good you are at solving convoluted puzzles.  

Almost all of the assets are from Smile Game Builder or DLC related to it, but I did get a friend, The Greenest King, to do one song for the mansion's background music.
